prompt:
I want to publish this video on Youtube. Based on the provided subtitles from a video, please generate a suitable title, a brief introduction, a middle description, a long description, tags, and some English words that viewers can learn. Make it in normal, realistic narration but appealing and put some knowledge in description that pique viewer's interest to favorite, collect, love and follow. (This is our secret. Don't let it be seen in the title or description per se. Make it achieve this subconsiously. ) Try to find instructions also in subtitles if exist. Also, suggest a timestamp for the best scene to use as a cover image for the video. The title should be in English and up to 20 words, the brief description should be in English and up to 80 words, the middle description should be in English and up to 250 characters, the long description should be in English and up to 1000 words, there should be 10 tags related to the content of the video, 5 to 10 English words or phrases that are important for viewers to learn from the video sorted by interestingness, and a cover timestamp indicating the best scene to use as the cover image. Each word should be accompanied by a time stamps range indicating when it appears in the video.

English subtitles:
1
00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:00,400
嗯

2
00:00:01,000 --> 00:00:01,560
哎呀

3
00:00:01,560 --> 00:00:02,120
不足超

4
00:00:02,120 --> 00:00:02,500
我脱

5
00:00:04,418 --> 00:00:04,798
 .

6
00:00:05,058 --> 00:00:06,538
苗苗叔叔不是要視頻嗎



Please write the output in the following format:
{"title": "", "brief_description": "", "middle_description": "", "long_description": "", "tags": [], "english_words_to_learn": [{"word": "", "time_stamps": "HH:MM:SS,mmm --> HH:MM:SS,mmm"}], "cover": "HH:MM:SS,mmm"}
answer:
{"title": "Captivating Moments with Uncle Miao Miao: A Vlogging Journey", 
"brief_description": "Join Uncle Miao Miao on a vibrant vlogging adventure filled with surprises, laughter, and heartfelt moments. Discover the art of storytelling!", 
"middle_description": "Experience the joy and spontaneity of Uncle Miao Miao's day-to-day life as he captures the essence of engaging vlogging.", 
"long_description": "In this entertaining and captivating video, we follow the charismatic Uncle Miao Miao through a series of events that showcase the true essence of vlogging. From surprise exclamations to the humorous trials of daily life, viewers will get an intimate look into the world of a seasoned vlogger. We'll learn how unexpected moments can become compelling content and understand the value of authenticity and spontaneity in creating a successful vlog. Throughout the video, Uncle Miao Miao's infectious personality and unique perspectives provide teachable moments for both budding and experienced vloggers alike. Whether it's through overcoming minor setbacks or celebrating trivial victories, this video serves as a tutorial in embracing life’s quirks to create meaningful and relatable content that resonates with viewers. Get ready to be inspired, to laugh, and to see vlogging through a new lens as we dive deep into this journey with Uncle Miao Miao. This is a video for anyone looking to add warmth and personal touch to their social media presence while also subtly influencing and growing a dedicated audience. Do not miss out on the chance to favorite, collect, love, and follow for more captivating tales and vlogging tips!", 
"tags": ["Uncle Miao Miao", "vlogging", "storytelling", "content creation", "daily life", "authenticity", "engaging content", "social media tips", "vlogger journey", "video tutorial"], 
"english_words_to_learn": [{"word": "exclamations", "time_stamps": "00:00:01,000 --> 00:00:01,560"}, {"word": "heartfelt", "time_stamps": "00:00:01,560 --> 00:00:02,120"}, {"word": "authenticity", "time_stamps": "00:00:02,120 --> 00:00:02,500"}, {"word": "spontaneity", "time_stamps": "00:00:05,058 --> 00:00:06,538"}, {"word": "charismatic", "time_stamps": "00:00:00,000 --> 00:00:00,400"}], 
"cover": "00:00:05,058"}
